# Rico Mercado
> Responsible AI & Governance advisor focused on AI-legible operations, minimal controls, readiness, and practical implementation.

## Summary
I help organizations build AI-legible, governable systems using minimal, auditable controls and readiness approaches. My work emphasizes practical governance models, evidence kits, and policy-to-practice execution for PH/ASEAN contexts.

## Services
- AI Governance & Readiness Audits
- Minimal Controls (MV-AIG) Design
- Responsible AI Operating Models
- Evidence Kits & Governance Tooling
- Policy-to-Execution Advisory

## Primary Sites
- https://ricomercado.co
- https://rightlensai.com

## Background
- AIM PGDGM 
- PMP (active); former Head of IT Business Applications, APAC
- AWS AI Practitioner + Solutions Architect/Security pathway
